title: Living Richly: Seizing the Potential of Inherited Wealth
description: An organic companion for those seeking to harness personal potential and overcome traps and burdens associated with an inheritance. This book is the go-to guide for conquering these obstacles by focusing on how to integrate with, take control over and preserve wealth, to live a fulfilling life and leave a lasting legacy. Keeping the emphasis on emotional well-being, Living Richly urges readers to uncover their true potential to align their self-worth with their net-worth.
author: Myra Salzer
